scripts.setup: npm run setup:ptau && npm run setup:zkey
scripts.setup:ptau: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 14 build/pot14_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute build/pot14_0000.ptau build/pot14_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v -e="random entropy" && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot14_0001.ptau build/pot14_final.ptau -v
scripts.setup:zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup build/DeliveryProof.r1cs build/pot14_final.ptau build/DeliveryProof_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/DeliveryProof_0000.zkey build/DeliveryProof_final.zkey --name="Contributor" -v -e="more random" && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/DeliveryProof_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
